platform.title: About KesenMemento
platform.intro1: This website is a digital archive collecting the
platform.intro1End: of people who live, grow, and visit Kesennuma.
platform.intro2: Beyond simple tourist information, we aim to convey the
platform.intro2End: between this land and its people. Memories of the tsunami, the journey of recovery, everyday joys, and hopes for the future. Each story is tied to a specific place in Kesennuma, allowing you to experience that location through a 3D map.
platform.pillar1Desc: Freely explore Kesennuma through 3D maps. Discover the stories embedded in each location.
platform.pillar2Desc: Post your experiences and memories. Anyone can easily leave their story with photos and text.
platform.pillar3Desc: Through places, connect past and future, visitors and community. Discover new charms of Kesennuma.

trust.title: For Your Peace of Mind
trust.communityDesc: We collaborate with Kesennuma City and local partners to provide reliable information.
trust.privacyDesc: Personal information during submission is strictly managed. You can freely choose your privacy settings.
trust.supportDesc: Feel free to contact us with questions about usage or feedback.
trust.improvementDesc: We continue to evolve into a more user-friendly platform based on your feedback.

contact.title: Contact & Feedback
contact.subtitle: Feel free to share your opinions, questions, or suggestions for improvement. Your voice helps create a better platform.
contact.generalDesc: Questions about usage, content, and general matters
contact.techDesc: We accept system issues and improvement suggestions on GitHub
contact.projectInfo: This project was developed at Kesennuma Hackatsuon 2025. A platform born from love for Kesennuma and the desire to energize the region through technology.
